article_text:
Here are results from the Heritage Invitational in Littleton as reported to trackwrestling.com:

TEAM SCORES

1. Castle View 166.5

2. Rocky Ford 159.5

3. Arapahoe 138.5

4. Douglas County 129.0

5. Broomfield 118.0

6. Lakewood 115.0

7. Heritage 111.5

8. Thunder Ridge 88.0

9. Columbine 66.0

10. Eaglecrest 61.5

11. Highlands Ranch 54.5

12. Cherry Creek 48.0

Round 1

Round 2

Round 2 – Arrturo Preciado (Rocky Ford) won by major decision over Byron Reffalt (Columbine) (Maj 11-3)

Round 3

article_summary:
Here are results from the Heritage Invitational in Littleton as reported to trackwrestling.com:TEAM SCORES1.
Castle View 166.52.
Rocky Ford 159.53.
Heritage 111.58.
Douglas County 129.05.
